name: Robo Bobo
description:
Save the big robot from the inside while controlling the little robot. Controls are like Will You Snail, so the arrow keys and 'enter' to open the doors

Credits:

Game: Waight 

Art: Bedroomshadows

Music & sound: Vibinbee

Notes:

- This game was made until the end of the second day of the jam

- Waight first used Godot one week prior to the jam

- The team met up for the jam
